outputs.summary_detailed: The video begins with a speedskating event, showcasing skaters on an ice rink. The text '2024' is visible in the background as two skaters prepare for their race. A timer displays '5.8', and another shows '10.9'. As the race progresses, one skater leads while others follow closely behind. A person wearing a cap with 'TB' stands in front of bookshelves, speaking into a microphone throughout the sequence. Skaters continue racing around the track, maintaining close proximity to each other. The lead skater maintains her advantage until nearing the finish line, where she crosses ahead of the group, capturing first place. Another skater follows closely but does not overtake the leader. The scene transitions to the final lap, marked by the text 'FINAL LAP,' with a timer showing '2:22.6.' The leading skater continues to maintain her pace, eventually crossing the finish line alone, indicating victory. The atmosphere remains competitive yet focused.

timeline.note: Skaters getting ready for the race

timeline.title: Race Begins
timeline.note: Skaters start skating around the rink

timeline.title: Lead Skater Maintains Advantage
timeline.note: One skater pulls ahead while others follow

timeline.title: Final Lap
timeline.note: Skaters near the finish line, leader still ahead

timeline.title: Victory
timeline.note: Leader crosses finish line solo, followed by another skater

empathy.summary_detailed_empathic: The video captures a speed skating event at the Gangwon 2024 Winter Olympics. It begins with two skaters in motion, one wearing green and blue gear, while another is seen standing on the ice rink. The scene transitions to multiple skaters racing closely together; they are all dressed similarly, suggesting they might be from the same team or country. A time of '5.8' seconds appears briefly before showing more skaters competing intensely. As the race progresses, a skater leads ahead with others following behind, displaying determination and effort as indicated by their body language and facial expressions. The text '2 LAPS TO GO' suggests it's nearing the end of the competition. Skaters continue to push hard towards the finish line, with times like '2:12.7', '3 LAPS TO GO', and '2:29.9' marking critical moments. The final frames show intense action near the end, highlighting competitive spirit and focus. Throughout this sequence, an individual speaking into a microphone provides commentary, adding context to the unfolding events. The overall atmosphere conveys high stakes, teamwork, and personal drive within the sport.

outputs.summary_detailed:
The video begins with a football match in progress at the Vitality Stadium, featuring players from AFC Bournemouth and AFC Wimbledon. The scoreboard shows AFC Bournemouth leading 1-0 against Fulham. A player in maroon is seen dribbling towards the goal, closely followed by opponents in green. He makes several attempts to score but fails as the goalkeeper intercepts each shot. Eventually, he passes the ball to a teammate who scores, increasing their lead. Celebrations follow with visible excitement among the fans.

The scene transitions to another part of the game where a player in black and red (AFC Bournemouth) is running on the field while an opponent in blue stands near the sideline. A close-up reveals him celebrating after scoring a goal, jumping into the air amidst cheering spectators. The focus shifts back to the ongoing match between AFC Bournemouth and Fulham, highlighting key moments such as crosses and shots on target, culminating in goals scored by AFC Bournemouth. The final frames show a jubilant celebration by the scorer, surrounded by teammates and animated crowd reactions.

Emotional expressions range from concentration during gameplay to jubilation upon successful plays, illustrating the personal stakes involved for each player. The background crowd's engagement underscores the communal aspect of sports, enhancing the overall sense of excitement and tension throughout the sequence.

outputs.summary_detailed: The video captures a football match between Brentford and Chelsea, showcasing various moments of gameplay. The action begins with Brentford in possession near the center circle as they attempt to advance towards the goal while facing defensive efforts from Chelsea players wearing blue kits. A corner kick is taken by Brentford but saved by Chelsea's goalkeeper, who then distributes the ball back into play. Multiple attempts are made by both teams; however, no goals are scored until later in the game when a cross results in an own goal for Brentford due to confusion among their defenders. Throughout the clip, there is constant movement, tackles, and challenges as both sides vie for control of the ball. Key events include a significant save by the Chelsea goalkeeper, intense physical confrontations leading to cards being shown, and strategic plays near the penalty area. The final scoreline shows Brentford losing 0-1 against Chelsea.

Own goal occurs due to defender confusion

Throughout, there's a sense of calm determination among the players, underscored by the tranquil yet challenging environment of the coastal golf course.

outputs.summary_detailed: The video captures an intense rugby match between Australia and Japan. The Australian team, in green jerseys with yellow accents, is seen defending against the Japanese team, who wear white jerseys with red stripes. The action begins near the center of the field where both teams are engaged in a ruck. Players from each side struggle for possession as they vie for control over the ball. A player named Sakuya from the Japanese team makes several attempts to break through the defense but faces strong resistance. As the game progresses, there's a significant moment when Sakuya manages to advance past defenders, showcasing her skillful play. Eventually, she scores a try, bringing the score closer at 12-10. However, this lead doesn't last long; soon after, another try by the Australian team restores their advantage, making it 14-12. Throughout the sequence, players demonstrate determination and athleticism, highlighting key plays such as tackles, passes, and strategic movements. The scoreboard updates reflect these changes in momentum, keeping track of the ongoing battle on the pitch.

This sequence underscores the emotional rollercoaster experienced during high-stakes sports events, reflecting teamwork, competition, and the ultimate triumph.

outputs.summary_detailed: The video begins with a black screen displaying the text 'Subscribe Now' in white font, followed by another message that reads 'Subscribe Now and Be Special' against a backdrop of red seats. The scene transitions to players walking onto a football field; one player is wearing a blue jersey while others are dressed in various colors including dark green and light blue. A group photo follows where several individuals pose together on the field, some holding trophies or medals. The focus then shifts to a close-up of an individual's face as they speak, set against a background filled with sponsor logos such as Heineken, Santander, Gazprom, Nissan, PS5, Mastercard, and Lay's. The narrative continues with more scenes of this person speaking, maintaining the same branded background. The action moves back to the football pitch, showing gameplay between teams in different colored kits – primarily red and white striped jerseys versus darker uniforms. Players engage actively, passing the ball around midfield, moving towards goals, and attempting shots. Key moments include celebrations from both sides, strategic plays near goal areas, defensive maneuvers, and attempts at scoring. The visual effects highlight these actions through overlay graphics. The sequence progresses with continued gameplay focusing on attacking runs, defensive blocks, passes, dribbles, and goal attempts. Midfielders maneuver for possession, defenders intercept, and forwards press forward. The intensity builds up with shots being taken and saves made by goalkeepers. The segment concludes with celebratory reactions post-scoring events and highlights significant matches like UEFA Champions League games, featuring prominent clubs such as Atletico Madrid.

The action intensifies as players from Atlético de Madrid skillfully maneuver around defenders, showcasing their teamwork and determination despite being outnumbered by the opposing team's yellow-clad goalkeeper. A critical goal is scored past the diving goalkeeper, marking a significant moment of celebration among the Atlético de Madrid players. Post-match celebrations continue with close-ups of players interacting joyfully amidst sponsor banners like Heineken, Santander, and Lay's, highlighting camaraderie and shared success. The atmosphere shifts slightly during post-match interviews where individuals reflect thoughtfully on the game, set against promotional backgrounds featuring UEFA Champions League branding. Emotions range from intense concentration during gameplay to reflective contemplation after the match, capturing both the highs of victory and the introspective aspects following competitive sports events.

empathy.summary_detailed_empathic: The video captures an intense boxing match between two fighters, showcasing a series of powerful punches and defensive maneuvers. The atmosphere is charged with tension as the audience watches intently from their seats in the background. One fighter wears black shorts with red accents labeled 'Kirkland' on his waistband, while the other sports green and white gloves along with light-colored trunks. Throughout the sequence, both competitors demonstrate agility and strength; however, it becomes evident that one fighter has been significantly outmatched. As the fight progresses, this underdog continues to absorb heavy blows despite showing resilience through defensive tactics such as ducking and blocking. Despite these efforts, he eventually succumbs to the relentless attacks, leading to knockdowns by his opponent. Medical personnel are seen attending to him after each fall, indicating concern for his well-being amidst the high-stakes competition. The narrative culminates in moments where emotions run high: the defeated boxer's struggle against fatigue and pain, contrasting sharply with the victorious stance of his opponent. The clip ends with scenes capturing camaraderie among team members supporting the victor post-fight, emphasizing themes of perseverance and competitive spirit.

outputs.summary_detailed: The video showcases a Premier League match between Liverpool and Leeds United. It starts with the score tied at 1-1, featuring intense gameplay from both teams. Key moments include Liverpool's goal by Luis Diaz in the first half, followed by attempts to equalize for Leeds through Rodrigo and Raphinha. The game transitions into injury time where Leeds makes several attacking moves, leading to a goal by Patrick Bamford that gives them a 2-1 lead. Despite late efforts by Liverpool, including a penalty miss by Roberto Firmino, Leeds holds onto their victory. Celebrations follow as players embrace on the field.

outputs.summary_detailed: The video showcases a football match between Brighton & Hove Albion (BHA) and Wolverhampton Wanderers (WOL). The game starts with BHA leading WOL 2-0 at the beginning of the second half. A player in yellow attempts to control the ball near their own goal but is challenged by players from both teams, resulting in a scramble that leads to an own goal for WOL. Subsequently, Brighton scores another goal through Pascal Gross, increasing their lead to 4-0. The action continues as Brighton maintains possession and pressure on WOL's defense, scoring again after a cross finds its way into the penalty area. The crowd reacts enthusiastically throughout, celebrating each goal. The final moments show Brighton further extending their lead while Wolves struggle defensively.

They continue their discussion as they drive through different areas, eventually arriving back outside near spectators who appear excited or engaged. An individual holds a sign reading 'SAINT EDDIE DAY,' indicating a celebratory event. Participants interact warmly, signing items like footballs and sharing moments together. The focus shifts to various interactions among attendees, including close-ups of hands holding signed items and conversations between participants.

The setting then moves indoors, showing detailed shots of feet walking across wooden floors and interacting within a modern office environment. Individuals engage in conversation around a table cluttered with personal belongings, maintaining a casual atmosphere. One person adjusts their shoes before joining others seated at tables equipped with microphones and laptops, suggesting preparations for interviews or discussions. The ambiance remains relaxed yet purposeful as more indoor scenes unfold, highlighting collaborative efforts and ongoing activities within this space.

The final segment shows two individuals sitting closely together in what appears to be another part of the same indoor location, possibly preparing for further interaction or recording. In the background, additional details such as framed pictures and decorative elements add context to the setting. This sequence captures a blend of preparation, collaboration, and interpersonal engagement amidst an organized but informal setup.

Spectators can be seen cheering and reacting enthusiastically. Key moments include successful shots, goal celebrations, and strategic plays.
